conbody.p: (a)(4) Follow DFARS 217.74 when contracting for long-lead items procured with other than advance procurement funds. When procurement funds must be added to an undefinitized long-lead procurement contract issued with advance procurement funds prior to definitization, follow the procedures at DFARS 217.74.
(b) When complying with the requirements described in DFARS 217.7402(b), SCOs must provide a courtesy copy to the cognizant HCA Workflow. Maintain proof of submission in the contract file.
